name: Dead crowd
description:
On a zombie apocalypse, a light of hope depends on your team. 

Four characters must across the devastated lands to accomplish the task of destroy all zombies. They must find the capital radio tower and use a mysterious cellphone inside it.

Dead crowd is a tactical turn-based game on a zombie apocalypse. You must manage your four characters through many levels, understand their forces and their weakness and use wisely their abilities, to flee the zones and see them become stronger.

Features :

  • Build your team : 12 characters, with different abilities and forces.
  • Use your critical weapon during the fight : grenade, gattling, turret...
  • Upgrade the shop : many characters and weapons available.
  • Across the 5 zones, avoid theirs traps and flee.
  • 30+ maps randomly choosed, each game is different.
  • 3 difficulties, easy, normal and hard mode.
  • Play with the mouse or with a gamepad.
    Created with Clickteam Fusion 2.5.
